summary: My first location mod for Skyrim, it just adds a common underground base for stealth-style characters, as a player house, can be entered from each major city.
descriptionHtml:
Hi friends. This is my first location mod for Skyrim, I know there may be bugs, if you notice, just let me know. Maybe I\'ll update this with new expanding rooms later.

Description: This mod just adds a new underground base for stealth characters as a player house. In here, you\'ll find three main room with one main hall: Smithing room, Enchanting and Alchemy room, a room with bed, table, chairs, chest and wardrobes, and main hall with 4 mannequins, 2 weapon racks and a Nocturnal statue centered on it.

Just paste RiftenThiefsBase.esp to your Skyrim/Data directory, then activate it from the Launcher.

Updated: The Base can be entered from five major cities\' sewer shortcuts now. (each one has it\'s own map marker)
author: TuCoT
